alfredsnippet.snippet:
C. Louis Kervran, Biological Transmutations, (1971), p.12, from the English translation by Crosby Lockwood, from an original in French (1966)

"It is a mistake to think that biology can ever be entirely explained in terms of chemistry: it is likewise a mistake to claim that physical laws are necessarily the same for living as for inanimate matter."
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Kervran on Biology
